abstract: Woman is killed by hit-and-run driver in East New York section of Brooklyn; driver hits six parked cars and injures roughly dozen other people before being quickly caught by police.
lead_paragraph: The woman was hit while trying to get into her car, the police said. About a dozen other people, including the driver, suffered minor injuries.

headline.main: Woman Is Fatally Struck in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Woman Is Fatally Struck in Brooklyn

snippet: The woman was hit while trying to get into her car, the police said. About a dozen other people, including the driver, suffered minor injuries.

keywords.value: Brookdale University Hospital and Medical Center
